name: Cowork
description: Anthropic's AI agent for general desktop computing and file management, built into Claude Desktop. Enables Claude to read, modify, and analyze files in designated folders, functioning as a general-purpose AI agent beyond just coding. Currently available to Max subscribers.
community_quotes: Brings Claude Code-style AI agents to general desktop computing
Claude Code without the code - works in your files without coding required
Mostly built by AI itself - largely built by Claude
Functions as a general-purpose AI agent rather than just a conversational chatbot
Currently available only to Max subscribers ($100-200/month plans)

name: Claude Code 2.1
description: Major update to Anthropic's Claude Code CLI featuring 1,096 commits with 16 major features including automatic skill hot-reload, session teleportation between devices, async sub-agents, enhanced multi-line input support, and project memory that overrides global settings.
community_quotes: One of the largest updates in Claude Code history with 1,096 commits
Skills created or modified are now immediately available with hot reloading
Project memory feature that overrides global settings
Smarter agents with smoother workflows and async sub-agents
80+ feature updates including 30+ new features and 40+ bug fixes

name: GitHub Copilot CLI Enhanced Agents
description: GitHub Copilot CLI update introducing enhanced agents with improved context management and new installation methods. Provides agent-powered, GitHub-native functionality that knows your repositories, issues, and PRs directly in the terminal.
community_quotes: Agent-powered, GitHub-native functionality in your terminal
Enhanced agents with improved context management
Allows creating specialized versions of the Copilot coding agent

name: Yolobox
description: A Go CLI tool that runs AI coding agents (Claude Code, Codex, Gemini) inside containerized sandboxes with full sudo access while protecting the host home directory from accidental damage. Featured on Show HN with 81-121 upvotes.
community_quotes: Let your AI go full send. Your home directory stays home
Run AI coding agents with full sudo without nuking home dir
Comes preinstalled with leading coding agent CLIs
Appeared in top 3 best Show HN posts for January 12, 2026

name: Litterbox
description: A Linux-based tool for creating isolated development environments with restricted SSH key access, designed to safely run AI coding agents with elevated privileges. Heavily relies on Podman for reproducible and somewhat isolated development environments.
community_quotes: Somewhat Isolated Development Environment
Exposes a Wayland socket for running entire dev environment inside container
Provides special SSH agent that always prompts user to confirm signing operation
Gives additional protection against exploits inside editor extensions

name: B-IR
description: A programming language specifically optimized for Large Language Models, designed to work more effectively with AI-assisted development workflows. Addresses syntax complexity issues in AI code generation.
community_quotes: An LLM-optimized programming language
Addresses the unique needs and patterns of AI-driven software development
Is the world ready for another programming language?
An LLM is optimized for its training data, not for newly built formats

name: agent-of-empires
description: An open-source tmux wrapper for managing AI coding sessions. Each AI coding session runs as a tmux session, providing better organization and management of multiple AI agent interactions.
community_quotes: A tmux wrapper for managing AI coding sessions
Each AI coding session runs as a tmux session
Helps organize and manage multiple AI agent interactions
